message: I'm feeling generous, but I think a 90/10 split is fair considering you're getting the short end of the stick with inflation.
Your offer was quite cheeky Alice! How about a more reasonable split? This is my counter offer -  60/40.
Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still need a decent share. How about 65/35?
This is getting us nowhere, Alice.  I'm proposing a 55/45 split.  It's fair and leaves us both with something substantial.
